GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: lpc32xx_udc: Fix refcount leak in lpc32xx_udc_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 727c82d003e0ec64411fd1257a9a57de4ad7a99a, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 24a28e4283510dcd58890379a42b8a7d3201d9d3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: gadget: lpc32xx_udc: Fix refcount leak in lpc32xx_udc_probe
